description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com
ZBrush iPad: https://www.maxon.net/en/zbrush-for-ipad

The folks over at Maxon have been working on an iPad version of ZBrush with the goal of making it full ZBrush not a watered down iPad version and it's a lot of fun to use. There is a free version as well as a full paid version with more features. 

Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClozNP-QPyVatzpGKC25s0A/join

title: ZBrush for the iPad Hands On
